name: eim_automated_tests
description: Automated tests scripts for ESP-IDF Installation Manager

scripts.test-CLI: export JSON_FILENAME=$npm_config_file && npx mocha --exit --reporter json --reporter-options output=./results-$JSON_FILENAME.json CLIRunner.test.js
scripts.test-CLI-win: powershell -Command "$env:JSON_FILENAME=$env:npm_config_file; npx mocha --exit --reporter json --reporter-options output=./results-$env:JSON_FILENAME.json CLIRunner.test.js"
scripts.test-GUI: export JSON_FILENAME=$npm_config_file && npx mocha --exit --reporter json --reporter-options output=./results-$JSON_FILENAME.json GUIRunner.test.js
scripts.test-GUI-win: powershell -Command "$env:JSON_FILENAME=$env:npm_config_file; npx mocha --exit --reporter json --reporter-options output=./results-$env:JSON_FILENAME.json GUIRunner.test.js"
